comments.body: So set `self.remote_user = None` here (in `__init__()`)  and then your current code will override it if necessary.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +78,82 @@        if LooseVersion(docker_version) < LooseVersion('1.3'):
            raise AnsibleError('docker connection type requires docker 1.3 or higher')

        # The remote user we will request from docker (if supported)
        self.remote_user = None
